ALL_DATA.ONLY_PROV: SELECT DISTINCT PROVINCIAID, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES
ALL_DATA.ONLY_CITIES: SELECT DISTINCT CIUDADID, PROVINCIAID, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE CIUDAD IS NOT NULL AND CIUDADID IS NOT NULL AND PROVINCIAID IS NOT NULL
ALL_DATA.ONLY_SECTORS: SELECT DISTINCT SECTORID, CIUDADID, SECTOR FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE SECTOR IS NOT NULL AND SECTORID IS NOT NULL AND CIUDADID IS NOT NULL
ALL_DATA.ONLY_SUB_SECTORS: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSECTORID, SECTORID, SUBSECTOR FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE SUBSECTOR IS NOT NULL AND SUBSECTORID IS NOT NULL AND SECTOR IS NOT NULL AND SECTORID IS NOT NULL
ALL_DATA.ALL_DATA_NOT_FILTER: SELECT ID, PROVINCIAID, PROVINCIA, CIUDADID, CIUDAD, SECTORID, SECTOR, SUBSECTORID, SUBSECTOR from YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES

PARAMETRE_DATA.SPECIFIC_CITY: SELECT DISTINCT CIUDADID, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE CIUDAD IS NOT NULL AND CIUDADID IS NOT NULL AND PROVINCIAID = _V1
PARAMETRE_DATA.SPECIFIC_SECTOR: SELECT DISTINCT SECTORID, SECTOR FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE SECTOR IS NOT NULL AND SECTORID IS NOT NULL AND CIUDADID = _V1
PARAMETRE_DATA.SPECIFIC_SUBSECTOR: SELECT DISTINCT SECTORID, SUBSECTOR FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE SUBSECTOR IS NOT NULL AND SUBSECTORID IS NOT NULL AND SECTORID = _V1
PARAMETRE_DATA.SPECIFIC_PROVXTT: SELECT UNIQUE PROVINCIAID, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE TECNOLOGIA = '_V1' AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V2
PARAMETRE_DATA.SPECIFIC_CITYXTT: SELECT UNIQUE CIUDADID, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE PROVINCIAID = _V1 AND TECNOLOGIA = '_V2' AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V3
PARAMETRE_DATA.SPECIFIC_SECTXTT: SELECT UNIQUE SECTORID, SECTOR FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE CIUDADID = _V1 AND TECNOLOGIA = '_V2' AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V3
PARAMETRE_DATA.SECTMXTT: SELECT UNIQUE SECTORID, SECTOR, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE CIUDADID IN (_V1) AND TECNOLOGIA = '_V2' AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V3

OFER.AD_OFERTAS: SELECT UNIQUE OFFERID, OFERTA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES

PLAN.AD_TARIFFPLAN: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANID, TARIFFPLAN FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES
PLAN.AD_TARIFFPLANVARIANT: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID, TARIFFPLANVARIANT FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE SERVICIO='_V1' AND TIPO_SERVICIO='_V2' AND TECNOLOGIA='_V3'
PLAN.AD_TARIFFPLAN_TARIFFPLANVARIANT: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANID, TARIFFPLAN, TARIFFPLANVARIANTID, TARIFFPLANVARIANT FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES

COMBO.COMBO_PLAN: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANID, TARIFFPLAN FROM Yview_Offer_Service_Tariffplan WHERE SERVICIO ='_V1'
COMBO.COMBO_PLANVARIANT: SELECT UNIQUE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID, TARIFFPLANVARIANT FROM Yview_Offer_Service_Tariffplan WHERE TARIFFPLANID = _V1
COMBO.COMBO_PRODUCTO: SELECT UNIQUE PRODUCTID, PRODUCTO FROM Yview_Offer_Service_Tariffplan WHERE TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V1
COMBO.COMBO_TIPO_SERVICIO: SELECT UNIQUE TIPO_SERVICIO FROM Yview_Offer_Service_Tariffplan WHERE PRODUCTID = _V1
COMBO.COMBO_PROVINCIA: SELECT UNIQUE PROVINCIAID, PROVINCIA FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE SERVICIO = '_V1' AND TIPO_SERVICIO = '_V2' AND TECNOLOGIA = '_V3' AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V4 ORDER BY PROVINCIA
COMBO.COMBO_CIUDAD: SELECT UNIQUE CIUDADID, CIUDAD, PROVINCIA  FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE SERVICIO = '_V1' AND TIPO_SERVICIO = '_V2' AND TECNOLOGIA = '_V3' AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V4 AND PROVINCIAID = _V5 ORDER BY CIUDAD
COMBO.COMBO_SECTOR: SELECT UNIQUE SECTORID, SECTOR, CIUDAD FROM YVIEW_OFFER_BY_CITIES WHERE SERVICIO = '_V1' AND TIPO_SERVICIO = '_V2' AND TECNOLOGIA = '_V3' AND TARIFFPLANVARIANTID = _V4 AND PROVINCIAID = _V5 AND CIUDADID = _V6 ORDER BY SECTOR

Finance.ALL_BURO: SELECT ID, NAME FROM trepvaluelistitems a  WHERE a.valuelistsymbol = 'TVC_CalificacionBuro'
Finance.ALL_MPAGOS: SELECT ID, NAME FROM Trepvaluelistitems WHERE Valuelistsymbol IN ('PaymentType','ManualPaymentType')
Finance.DIAS_GOZADOS: SELECT ID, NAME FROM Trepvaluelistitems where VALUELISTSYMBOL = 'YN'
